name: Crazy Treasure Token
description: Crazy Treasure is a blockchain play-to-earn game with three types of gameplay: Treasure aiders, mining, and adventure. 1. Multi-chain compatible treasure games based on ETH, BSC, etc, where players can use USDT to participate in the game, not only can 1USDT have the opportunity to earn 1BTC or 1ETH, but also can get the game token CTT. 2. Mining games based on BSC chain, where players use the game token CTT to draw/auction the NFT of the platform, obtain the mining role to participate in the game, and obtain the CTT revenue of continuous output every day. 3. Adventure games based on the BSC chain, where players use the game token CTT to obtain the adventure role to participate in the game, and each time obtain CTT, BUSD, NFT and other uncertain income.
